meta.job_title: System Life Cycle Logistics And Planning Coordinator

duties_responsibilities.duty: Support new VCS acquisition programs and existing VS&R programs within the NAS, interacting with a team comprised of Noblis, subcontractor, industry/vendor, and FAA staff.

Understand, manage and track supply chain risks including time and cost, manage diminishing manufacturing sources and material shortages (DMSMS), and analyze equipment components that are approaching obsolescence and plan for sustainment.
Apply logistics life cycle knowledge to support FAA VS&R programs, projects, and acquisition activities.

Conduct technical reviews of contractor system logistics-related reports and deliverables, and support analysis and management of diminishing manufacturing sources and equipment approaching obsolescence.
Learn about the Noblis business development lifecycle, processes, tools, and account structure, and contribute specialized domain or technical content to proposal sections or client white papers.
Build a productive relationship with the client and understand their structure and goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree and 6-15 years of relevant logistics and system life cycle management experience.
